alert.note: Alert for Desha; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 12 at 5:14AM CDT until July 12 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Southern Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Eastern Drew County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 800 AM CDT. * At 514 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen over the past hour. More thunderstorms are expected to continue to move over these same areas...with additional heavy rainfall expected. As a result...flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Rohwer, Arkansas City, Tillar, Winchester, McGehee, Lucca Landing, Prairie Grove, Reed, Jerome, Baxter, Masonville, Halley, McArthur, Collins and Selma. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
